client-base.name: Mage.net Client Base
client-base.description: Base client modpack for minecraft.mage.net with performance optimizations, essential tools, and quality of life improvements. Includes Xaero's minimap for navigation and selected optimization mods for smooth gameplay.

client-enhanced.name: Mage.net Client Enhanced
client-enhanced.description: Enhanced client modpack for minecraft.mage.net featuring the base pack plus shader support, resource packs, and additional visual enhancements. Perfect for players wanting the full visual experience.

server.name: Mage.net Server
server.description: Server modpack for minecraft.mage.net with performance optimizations, admin tools, and enhanced gameplay features. Designed to work seamlessly with the client packs for the best multiplayer experience.
